name: rest-chat
description: * start from the up-to-date master branch (`git checkout master; git pull origin master`) * Create a feature branch named 'chat-spa' (`git checkout -b chat-spa`) * modify the files in this directory to have the require features * add, commit, and push the branch to github * Create a PR to merge to master * Be sure to include the TA(s) and I as reviewers.   * Due by 11:59pm (PT) Sun Mar 22
